ALTER PROCEDURE [dbo].[dsh_GetGroupsByPeriod] @begin DATE='06.06.2014' ,@end DATE='06.06.2017' AS
BEGIN --drop table #Contacts
create table #Contacts(contact_id int , region_id int,firstLevel_id int,mainManager_id int,employe_id int) insert into #Contacts
select distinct contact_id, region_id,firstLevel_id,mainManager_id,employe_id from ent_Contacts ec INNER JOIN ent_Delivery ed ON ed.contact_id = ec.id_contact WHERE ec.isReport = 1 AND ed.date >= @begin AND ed.date <= @end --TODO: для чего .value('.', 'varchar(max)')???? SELECT cast( '{"Contact_Region":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(er.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(er.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_Regions er where exists(select 1 from #Contacts ec where er.id = ec.region_id) order by er.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Contact_FirstLevel":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(ep.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(ep.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_FirstLevels ep where exists(select 1 from #Contacts ec where ep.id = ec.firstLevel_id) order by ep.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Good_GroupNMK":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(eg.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(eg.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_GroupNMK eg order by eg.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Good_subGroupNMK":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(es.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(es.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_SubgroupNMK es order by es.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Good_brend":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(eb.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(eb.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_Brends eb order by eb.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Contact_MainManager":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(es.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(es.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_MainManagers es where exists(select 1 from #Contacts ec where es.id = ec.mainManager_id) order by es.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],' /* + '"Contact_name":['+ isnull(( select STUFF(( SELECT DISTINCT ',{"id":' + cast(ec.id_contact as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(ec.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_Contacts ec INNER JOIN ent_Delivery ed ON ec.id_contact = ed.contact_id WHERE ec.isReport = 1 AND ed.date >= @begin AND ed.date <= @end for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],' */
+ '"Good_kindPacking":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(ek.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(ek.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_KindPacking ek order by ek.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Good_BKG":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(ebkg.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(ebkg.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_BKG ebkg order by ebkg.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Contact_Manager":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(ee.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(ee.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_Employe ee where exists(select 1 from #Contacts ec where ee.id = ec.employe_id) order by ee.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Goods_Type":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(gt.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(gt.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_GoodsType gt order by gt.name for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') --+'],' +'],'
+ '"Contact_Category":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(cc.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(cc.name, '"', '\"') +'"}'
FROM ent_ContactCategory cc where cc.isDeleted = 0 order by cc.name
for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +'],'
+ '"Contact_Geography":['+ isnull(( SELECT STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(g.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(g.geographyValue, '"', '\"') +'"}'
FROM ent_Geography g order by g.geographyValue
for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +']'
--+ --'"Contact_Group":['+ --isnull(( --SELECT STUFF(( --SELECT --',{"id":' + cast(cg.id as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' --+ REPLACE(cg.[key] + ' ' + cg.name, '"', '\"') +'"}' --FROM ent_ContactGroups cg --order by cg.treeKey --for xml path(''), type --).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') --), '') --+']'
/*товары берем не все!!! Из 2-х групп. Смотри rpt_GetNomenclature + '"Good_name":['+ isnull(( select STUFF(( SELECT ',{"id":' + cast(eg.id_good as varchar(max)) + ',"name":"' + REPLACE(REPLACE(eg.name, '\', '\\'), '"', '\"') +'"}' FROM ent_Goods eg for xml path(''), type ).value('.', 'varchar(max)'), 1, 1, '') ), '') +']' */
+ '}' as text) as jsonfile
END
